website_summaries.verdict: An affordable shaving cream that will last you a long time.
pros: Expands nicely, so you don't have to use a lot
Can is rust-proof, making it ideal for the shower
Doesn't leave a residue on your skin
cons: Tends to wash off easily if it gets wet

customer_reviews.title: Thick, moisturizing foam
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick foam! They're protective and moisturizing, and the add-on price is great. I also like that the can is rust-free design. I don't care much for the scent (raspberry), but washes clean and doesn't linger. One of my favorite shaving cream!

customer_reviews.title: Very good price for the amount you get
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for the amount you get. I've been using this product exclusively for a few years and it's never let me down, it's super thick & creamy and foams up a ton so a little goes a long way. The reason I'm rating this as 2-stars is because mine arrived with no cap which makes me fairly hesitant to use it (I checked the box / sorted through all of the packaging to make sure it didn't pop off on accident and it wasn't anywhere to be found.) So this product is 5/5 usually but the handling of it was 0/5 this time around.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried this product I loved it. It goes on nice; not too liquid, not too firm. Also it is super white foam so you can never miss a spot while shaving, like with clearish shaving cream. But then, when I rinsed it off, I hated it. It left my skin feeling sticky and gross. Other shaving creams leave my skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. So I would suggest trying it out, it is the cheapest shaving cream at almost every store (like $2). Just don't be disappointed if it sucks.

product_meta.title: Pure Silk Raspberry Mist Shave Cream for Women, 8 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Pure silk raspberry mist shave cream features a sweet, fruity fragrance that will remind you of summertime. The infusion of rich moisturizers protects, nourishes and provides a smooth glide to leave your skin looking, and feeling, as smooth as pure silk. Available in a rust-proof aluminum can, pure silk shave cream is ideal for the shower. For a smooth and close shave, use with new pure silk razors.
